00011

00013    {
00014       vciOK = TRUE;        // no cells are lost in the beginning
00015       vciFirst = TRUE;     // first cell is first of a packet
00016       received = 0;
00017       lost = 0;
00018       received0 = 0;
00019       lost0 = 0;
00020       served = 0;

00027 
00028    int vciOK;           // is a cell of the actual frame (not) lost?
00029    int vciFirst;        // next cell is the first of a frame
00030    int received;
00031    int lost;
00032    int received0;
00033    int lost0;
00034    int served;

00036    int qlen0;           // actual queuelength of CLP=0 cells
00037    int maxqlen_epd;     // maximal vci queue length (perform EPD then)
00038    int maxqlen1_epd;    // maximal vci queue length for CLP1 (perform EPD then)
00039    
00040    double SCR;          // reserved SCR
00041    double SCR_ratio;    // the ratio of this VC
00042 };
